english_translation: Thinking someone has come and knocked on the door.
Do not go and open the door moment after moment.

kannada_original: ಬಾಗಿಲಿನ ಬಳಿ ಬಂದು ಒಮ್ಮೆ ನಿಲುವನು ಕಾಲ
english_transliteration: Bāgilina baḷi bandu omme niluvanu kāla
english_translation: Time will come to the door and stop once.

kannada_original: ತೆರೆ ಆಗ ನಗುತ ಕದ – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Tere āga naguta kada – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: Then open the door smiling – Muddu Rama.
